sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default class ShowBlogs extends Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state = {blog:[]} } componentDidMount(){ const {match : {params} } = this.props axios.get(`http://localhost:3031/blogs/${params.id}`) .then(response => this.setState({blog: response.data})) .catch(err => console.error(err.message)) } render(){ const {blog} = this.state console.log(blog) retun(
{blog.title}
{blog.created}

{blog.body}

) } }
